name: overeducate
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to educate someone more than is necessary or helpful: Our society has reached the point where young people over-educate themselves simply in order to obtain reasonably good jobs. The market has overeducated us, making our tastes too sophisticated. Related word
overeducated
More examplesFewer examplesThey have overeducated their children, who are now critical of the roots they came from.He has overeducated himself in an attempt to impress his employers.It is a golden rule not to over-educate the customer about the product.
